Package org.opt4j.core.config.visualization

Class DefaultTasksPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.opt4j.core.config.visualization.TasksPanel
              • org.opt4j.core.config.visualization.DefaultTasksPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TaskListener, TaskStateListener, Startupable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Opt4JTasksPanel

    public class DefaultTasksPanel
extends TasksPanel
implements TaskListener
    The DefaultTasksPanel extends the TasksPanel and shows all Tasks in a table.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
